Tracking Records
=================


**Number of Tracking Records Types**::


	=============== ======= ======= =============================== ==================
	TYPE	         LEVEL	NUMBER	DESCRIPTION			Number of Records
	=============== ======= ======= =============================== ==================
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	0	MC Status Inquiry			1
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	1	FICS Status Inquiry					
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	2	Other Account Information		1
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	3	Credit Card Status Inquiry
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	4	Unclaimed Property Information
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	5	IRA RMD Recalculation Info		1
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	6	Non-Mbr Bond/Member 1099-INT		2+
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	7	Corporate Member Data
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	8	NetTeller
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	9	Service List
	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	10	Foreign Country Access

	TRACKING	ACCOUNT	14	Account Change History
